function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of natural window views and nature experiences in housing design","Impact":"Decreased resident well-being and satisfaction, potential impact on mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Incorporating natural window views and nature experiences in housing design, promoting access to outdoor views","Technologies":"Incorporating large windows, green spaces, and natural elements in housing design","People":"Residents of mid-and high-rise apartment housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"},{"Description":"Limited access to outdoor views during a pandemic","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for restorative experiences, potential impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Creating spaces that support soft fascination and enable reflection, providing access to outdoor views within dwellings","Technologies":"Incorporating large windows, green spaces, and natural elements in housing design","People":"Residents of mid-and high-rise apartment housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"},{"Description":"Relying on directed attention within the built environment","Impact":"Increased mental fatigue and reduced capacity for restoration, potential impact on occupant well-being","Mitigation":"Designing spaces that do not require large amounts of directed attention, promoting access to restorative environments","Technologies":"Incorporating restorative environmental design principles, creating spaces for soft fascination and relief","People":"Residents of mid-and high-rise apartment housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers"}]}
